Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Receive a Samsonite Engenero Spinner 69cm Luggage worth S$560 when you apply now!

Fastest earn rate - 3 miles for every S$1 spent on Singapore Airlines, SilkAir and KrisShop, 2.4 miles for every S$1 spent overseas and 1.4 miles for every S$1 spent locally, with no minimum spend. Plus, choice to redeem from over 40 airlines, cash or travel packages.
Choice to redeem from over 40 airlines, cash or travel packages.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: Samsonite Engenero Spinner 69cm Luggage applicable to cards approved from 1 October - 31 December 2015 and not applicable to existing UOB PRVI Miles Cardmembers. Promotion is limited to first 300 successful card applicants in each qualifying period, who make a minimum spend of S$3,000 within a month from card approval date.
To receive complimentary travel insurance, cardmembers must charge the entire fare of the public conveyance in advance of the scheduled departure time to the UOB PRVI Miles Card.

Cardmembers will earn UNI$7.5 for every S$5 spent at Singapore Airlines, SilkAir and KrisShop (equivalent to 3 miles for every S$1 spent), UNI$6 for every S$5 spent on transactions in foreign currencies (equivalent to 2.4 miles for every S$1 spent) and UNI$3.5 for every S$5 spent on transactions in Singapore Dollars (equivalent to 1.4 miles for every S$1 spent).

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureDetails: 1. 8,000 air miles for New UOB card applicants OR 2. 5,000 air miles for existing UOB cardholders applying for PRVI Miles Credit Cards
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1. Promotion limited to first 1,000 successful applicants who spend a min. of S$1,500 within the first month. 2. Qualified Applicants who have never been issued any UOB credit cards shall be entitled to 8,000 air miles. 3. Qualified Applicants who have active UOB cards issued to them shall be entitled to 5,000 air miles.

Details.Name: Online Shopping
Details.Feature: S$1 (spent on Singapore Airlines, SilkAir & KrisShop) = 3 miles
